General.Name: Nova Technology
General.Description: Nova Technology Corporation provides services for semiconductor plants, photonics plants, solar energy, biotech, pharmaceutical, and chemical industrial manufacturers in Taiwan, China, Vietnam, Singapore, and Malaysia. It offers waste chemical recovery and supply systems; bulk gas and special gas dispense systems; wet bench systems; chemical dispense system and packing systems; and green energy and environmental protection integration systems. It also engages in the wholesale of electronic equipment; and imports and exports business, as well as provides pipeline assembly, maintenance, and engineering services for electronic equipment, computer parts and accessories, equipment, and chemical material and gas components. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan. Nova Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Acter Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 76, Jiafeng South Road, Zhubei, Taiwan, 30272
